alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 1:08PM CDT until June 08 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central McLennan County in central Texas... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 108 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Creek Lake, or near Robinson, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waco, Bellmead, Riesel, Hallsburg, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Lake Creek Lake, Asa and Downsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
